options_description.repo_url: HTTPS or SSH URL of the Git repository to track.
options_description.branch: Branch or ref to check out (defaults to main).
options_description.access_token: Personal access token for private Git repositories.
options_description.ha_access_token: Long-lived Home Assistant token used when Supervisor access is unavailable.
options_description.ha_base_url: Base URL for direct Home Assistant API calls.
options_description.ha_verify_ssl: Enable when the Home Assistant base URL has a trusted certificate.
options_description.target_path: Directory where changed files are copied (usually /config).
options_description.git_depth: Shallow clone depth; set to 0 for full history.
options_description.ha_event_name: Event fired after a successful sync.
options_description.notify_on_startup: Send a notification after the first successful sync.
options_description.verify_ssl: Toggle TLS verification for the Git remote.
options_description.mqtt_topic: MQTT topic used when publishing changes.
options_description.mqtt_username: MQTT username if authentication is required.
options_description.mqtt_password: MQTT password if authentication is required.
options_description.mqtt_qos: Quality of Service level for MQTT messages.
options_description.mqtt_retain: Retain MQTT messages on the broker.
options_description.http_api_port: Port exposed by the FastAPI management endpoint.
